General.Name: Perfect Moment Ltd.
General.Description: Perfect Moment Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, owns and operates a fashion brand that offers ski, surf, and activewear collections under the brand name of Perfect Moment in the United States and the United Kingdom. The company offers skiwear, outerwear, swimwear and activewear for women, men, and children. Perfect Moment Ltd. sells its collections directly to customers through e-commerce and to wholesale accounts, as well as through other sales partnerships. The company was founded in 1984 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 307 Canalot Studios, London, United Kingdom, W10 5BN
